text: chaahiye ki sampann, kharch de apanee kamaee ke anusaar aur tang ho jisapar usakee jeevika, use chaahiye ki kharch de usamen se, jo diya hai use allaah ne. allaah bhaar nahin rakhata kisee praanee par, parantu utana hee, jo use diya hai. sheeghr hee kar dega allaah tangee ke pashchaat suvidha
